page.title: 14Mixed Farming:Ridgeway Farm
page.content: This farm is a{general farm,} covering 40 hectares. There are 80 beef cattle which are Hereford cross Friesian and one{house cow}from which the farmer and his wife get their milk. There is also an old family horse and two geese. The farm produces potatoes, hops, grass, wheat and barley. The farmer has specialised equipment for potatoe growing, including planters and harvesters. The usual rotation is 4 years of arable crops and then 4 years of ley. The cattle are fed on raw barley as well as silage in the winter. The farm is a family farm. The farmer and his old father worked it together. The family had been on the farm for 50 years. The farm is not typical of its neighbourhood.
